paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information related to the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with familial amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on multiple studies.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is the most common associated with amyloidosis.
key_quotes: In Saudi Arabia, data mining identified that p.Val142Ile was the most common variant associated with amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The variant has been found in the Saudi population.

variants.population_frequency: allele frequency of 0.00004 in Saudi Arabia.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on population studies.
variants.additional_notes: Also found in 1.1% of the population in northwest Ireland.
key_quotes: The variant c.238A>G(p.Thr80Ala) was also found in the Saudi population (allele frequency of 0.00004).

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
